title: League Of Legends Recording
body:
I was recording on league with the new replay system and this pops up 
6-22_NA1-2349398122_01.webm
how do i rewatch this recording?

replies.body: I'm not totally familiar with replays yet, but I think .webm can be dragged onto your browser to be viewed instead of through your client.  We also released a [Replay FAQ ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/2JWmR6sF-replays-are-live-in-the-new-client-faq-pro-tips)that might help as well.  If you have any questions or feedback during testing, let our devs know at the cl[i](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)ent boards.  Good luck!
